title: Unimodal sequences and mixed false theta functions
abstract:
We consider two-parameter generalizations of Hecke-Appell type expansions for
the generating functions of unimodal and special unimodal sequences. We then
determine their explicit representations which involve mixed false theta
functions. These results complement recent striking work of Mortenson and
Zwegers on the mixed mock modularity of the generalized $U$-function due to
Hikami and Lovejoy.
